verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> now it was אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> this וּלְאַבְשָׁל֧וֹם <S%H53><s%> this that Absalom בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister יָפָ֖ה <S%H3303><s%> had a fair וּשְׁמָ֣הּ <S%H8034><s%> whose name תָּמָ֑ר <S%H8559><s%> [was] Tamar וַיֶּאֱהָבֶ֖הָ <S%H157><s%> loved אַמְנ֥וֹן <S%H550><s%> and Amnon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David

וַיֵּ֨צֶר <S%H3334><s%> was so vexed לְאַמְנ֜וֹן <S%H550><s%> And Amnon לְהִתְחַלּ֗וֹת <S%H2470><s%> that he fell sick בַּֽעֲבוּר֙ <S%H5668><s%> because תָּמָ֣ר <S%H8559><s%> Tamar אֲחֹת֔וֹ <S%H269><s%> for his sister כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בְתוּלָ֖ה <S%H1330><s%> for she [was] a virgin הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> and it וַיִּפָּלֵא֙ <S%H6381><s%> it hard בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> thought אַמְנ֔וֹן <S%H550><s%> and Amnon לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> for him to do לָ֖הּ מְאֽוּמָה׃ <S%H3972><s%> any thing

וּלְאַמְנ֣וֹן <S%H550><s%> But Amnon רֵ֗עַ <S%H7453><s%> had a friend וּשְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> whose name יֽוֹנָדָ֔ב <S%H3122><s%> [was] Jonadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שִׁמְעָ֖ה <S%H8093><s%> of Shimeah אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> brother דָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David's וְי֣וֹנָדָ֔ב <S%H3122><s%> and Jonadab אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חָכָ֖ם <S%H2450><s%> subtil מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [was] a very

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said ל֗וֹ מַדּ֣וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> why אַ֠תָּה <S%H859><s%> are you כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> so דַּ֤ל <S%H1800><s%> lean בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> unto him Why [art] thou [being] the king's בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> from day בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning הֲל֖וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תַּגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> bewray לִ֑י וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ אַמְנ֔וֹן <S%H550><s%> me? And Amnon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תָּמָ֗ר <S%H8559><s%> Tamar אֲח֛וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister אַבְשָׁלֹ֥ם <S%H53><s%> Absalom's אָחִ֖י <S%H251><s%> my brother אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am אֹהֵֽב׃ <S%H157><s%> unto him I love

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ יְה֣וֹנָדָ֔ב <S%H3082><s%> And Jonadab שְׁכַ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> unto him Lay thee down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁכָּבְךָ֖ <S%H4904><s%> on thy bed וְהִתְחָ֑ל <S%H2470><s%> and make thyself sick וּבָ֧א <S%H935><s%> cometh אָבִ֣יךָ <S%H1><s%> and when thy father לִרְאוֹתֶ֗ךָ <S%H7200><s%> to see וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> thee say אֵלָ֡יו <S%H413><s%> about תָּ֣בֹא <S%H935><s%> come נָא֩ <S%H4994><s%> Please תָמָ֨ר <S%H8559><s%> Tamar אֲחוֹתִ֜י <S%H269><s%> unto him I pray thee let my sister וְתַבְרֵ֣נִי <S%H1262><s%> and give לֶ֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> me meat וְעָשְׂתָ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> and dress לְעֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> in my sight אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבִּרְיָ֔ה <S%H1279><s%> the meat לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> that אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> i אֶרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> that I may see וְאָכַלְתִּ֖י <S%H398><s%> [it] and eat מִיָּדָֽהּ׃ <S%H3027><s%> [it] at her hand

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> lay down אַמְנ֖וֹן <S%H550><s%> So Amnon וַיִּתְחָ֑ל <S%H2470><s%> and made himself sick וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> was come הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and when the king לִרְאֹת֗וֹ <S%H7200><s%> to see וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַמְנ֤וֹן <S%H550><s%> him Amnon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king תָּֽבוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> come נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> Please תָּמָ֣ר <S%H8559><s%> I pray thee let Tamar אֲחֹתִ֗י <S%H269><s%> my sister וּתְלַבֵּ֤ב <S%H3823><s%> and make לְעֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> in my sight שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> me a couple לְבִב֔וֹת <S%H3834><s%> of cakes וְאֶבְרֶ֖ה <S%H1262><s%> that I may eat מִיָּדָֽהּ׃ <S%H3027><s%> at her hand

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> Then David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תָּמָ֖ר <S%H8559><s%> to Tamar הַבַּ֣יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> home לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְכִ֣י <S%H1980><s%> Go נָ֗א <S%H4994><s%> now בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> house אַמְנ֣וֹן <S%H550><s%> Amnon's אָחִ֔יךְ <S%H251><s%> now to thy brother וַעֲשִׂי־ <S%H6213><s%> and dress ל֖וֹ הַבִּרְיָֽה׃ <S%H1279><s%> him meat

וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went תָּמָ֗ר <S%H8559><s%> So Tamar בֵּ֛ית <S%H1004><s%> house אַמְנ֥וֹן <S%H550><s%> Amnon's אָחִ֖יהָ <S%H251><s%> to her brother וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he שֹׁכֵ֑ב <S%H7901><s%> and he was laid down וַתִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> And she took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּצֵ֤ק <S%H1217><s%> flour [וַתָּלֹושׁ כ] (וַתָּ֙לָשׁ֙ <S%H3888><s%> knead ק) וַתְּלַבֵּ֣ב <S%H3823><s%> [it] and made cakes לְעֵינָ֔יו <S%H5869><s%> in his sight וַתְּבַשֵּׁ֖ל <S%H1310><s%> and did bake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְּבִבֽוֹת׃ <S%H3834><s%> the cakes

וַתִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> And she took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּשְׂרֵת֙ <S%H4958><s%> a pan וַתִּצֹ֣ק <S%H3332><s%> and poured [them] out לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before וַיְמָאֵ֖ן <S%H3985><s%> him but he refused לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <S%H398><s%> to eat וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַמְנ֗וֹן <S%H550><s%> And Amnon הוֹצִ֤יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> Have out כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> all men מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and וַיֵּצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> from me And they went out כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַמְנ֜וֹן <S%H550><s%> And Amnon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to תָּמָ֗ר <S%H8559><s%> unto Tamar הָבִ֤יאִי <S%H935><s%> Bring הַבִּרְיָה֙ <S%H1279><s%> the meat הַחֶ֔דֶר <S%H2315><s%> into the chamber וְאֶבְרֶ֖ה <S%H1262><s%> that I may eat מִיָּדֵ֑ךְ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took תָּמָ֗ר <S%H8559><s%> And Tamar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְּבִבוֹת֙ <S%H3834><s%> the cakes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔תָה <S%H6213><s%> which she had made וַתָּבֵ֛א <S%H935><s%> and brought לְאַמְנ֥וֹן <S%H550><s%> to Amnon אָחִ֖יהָ <S%H251><s%> her brother הֶחָֽדְרָה׃ <S%H2315><s%> [them] into the chamber

וַתַּגֵּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> And when she had brought אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to לֶֽאֱכֹ֑ל <S%H398><s%> [them] unto him to eat וַיַּֽחֲזֶק־ <S%H2388><s%> he took hold בָּהּ֙ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> of her and said לָ֔הּ בּ֛וֹאִי <S%H935><s%> unto her Come שִׁכְבִ֥י <S%H7901><s%> lie עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> with אֲחוֹתִֽי׃ <S%H269><s%> with me my sister

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she answered ל֗וֹ אַל־ <S%H408><s%> No אָחִי֙ <S%H251><s%> him Nay my brother אַל־ <S%H408><s%> No תְּעַנֵּ֔נִי <S%H6031><s%> do not force כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יֵֽעָשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> to be done כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> me for no such thing ought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> No תַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבָלָ֥ה <S%H5039><s%> not thou this folly הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> for

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> me אָ֤נָה <S%H575><s%> where אוֹלִיךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> get אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶרְפָּתִ֔י <S%H2781><s%> And I whither shall I cause my shame וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you תִּהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> shalt be as כְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> ? and as for thee thou shalt be as one הַנְּבָלִ֖ים <S%H5036><s%> of the fools בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now דַּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> Now therefore I pray thee speak נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יִמְנָעֵ֖נִי <S%H4513><s%> for he will not withhold מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֖ה <S%H14><s%> Howbeit he would לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken בְּקוֹלָ֑הּ <S%H6963><s%> unto her voice וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> but being stronger מִמֶּ֙נָּה֙ <S%H4480><s%> than וַיְעַנֶּ֔הָ <S%H6031><s%> than she forced וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> her and lay אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיִּשְׂנָאֶ֣הָ <S%H8130><s%> hated אַמְנ֗וֹן <S%H550><s%> Then Amnon שִׂנְאָה֙ <S%H8135><s%> so that the hatred גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> her [was] greater מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> A very כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for גְדוֹלָ֗ה <S%H1419><s%> her was greater הַשִּׂנְאָה֙ <S%H8135><s%> the hatred אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שְׂנֵאָ֔הּ <S%H8130><s%> wherewith he hated מֵאַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> than the love אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲהֵבָ֑הּ <S%H157><s%> wherewith he had loved וַֽיֹּאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said לָ֥הּ אַמְנ֖וֹן <S%H550><s%> her And Amnon ק֥וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> unto her Arise לֵֽכִי׃ <S%H1980><s%> go

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said ל֗וֹ אַל־ <S%H408><s%> No אוֹדֹ֞ת <S%H182><s%> unto him [There is] no cause הָרָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> this evil הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> [is] greater הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מֵאַחֶ֛רֶת <S%H312><s%> than the other אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you עָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> that thou didst עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> in לְשַׁלְּחֵ֑נִי <S%H7971><s%> in sending me away וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֖ה <S%H14><s%> unto me But he would לִשְׁמֹ֥עַֽ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken לָֽהּ׃

וַיִּקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> Then he called אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַעֲרוֹ֙ <S%H5288><s%> his servant מְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <S%H8334><s%> that ministered וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said שִׁלְחוּ־ <S%H7971><s%> Put נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Now אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מֵעָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> now הַח֑וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> now this [woman] out וּנְעֹ֥ל <S%H5274><s%> from me and bolt הַדֶּ֖לֶת <S%H1817><s%> the door אַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H310><s%> after
